languages.text: Сервочереп из Камеры Патента передал сообщение от Эдельтрада — наследник жив и собирает верных династии людей для штурма мостика. Необходимо успеть на эту встречу, чтобы объединить силы и вместе дать отпор Кунраду.

traits.locale_text: Сервочереп из Камеры Патента передал сообщение от Эдельтрада — наследник жив и собирает верных династии людей для штурма мостика. Необходимо успеть на эту встречу, чтобы объединить силы и вместе дать отпор Кунраду.

languages.text: A servo-skull from the Warrant Chamber has relayed Edelthrad's message: the heir is alive and gathering people loyal to the dynasty to storm the bridge. It is vital to make it to this meeting to unite forces with Edelthrad and confront Kunrad.
languages.original_text: Сервочереп из Камеры Патента передал сообщение от Эдельтрада — наследник жив и собирает верных династии людей для штурма мостика. Необходимо успеть на эту встречу, чтобы объединить силы и вместе дать отпор Кунраду.

traits.locale_text: Servo-skull from the Warrant Chamber has relayed Edelthrad's message: the heir is alive and is gathering people loyal to the dynasty to storm the bridge. It's paramount to make it to this meeting to unite forces with Edelthrad and confront Kunrad.

A servo-skull from the Warrant Chamber has relayed Edelthrad's message: the heir is alive and gathering people loyal to the dynasty to storm the bridge. It is vital to make it to this meeting to unite forces with Edelthrad and confront Kunrad.

A servo-skull from the Warrant Chamber has relayed Edelthrad's message: the heir is alive and gathering people loyal to the dynasty to storm the bridge. It is vital to make it to this meeting to unite forces with Edelthrad and confront Kunrad.

languages.text: Ein Servoschädel der Handelsbriefkammer hat Edelthrads Nachricht übermittelt: Der Erbe ist am Leben und sammelt für einen Sturm auf die Brücke loyale Anhänger der Dynastie um sich. Es ist unerlässlich, es zu diesem Treffen zu schaffen, sich mit Edelthrad zusammenzutun und Kunrad zu stellen.
languages.original_text: A servo-skull from the Warrant Chamber has relayed Edelthrad's message: the heir is alive and gathering people loyal to the dynasty to storm the bridge. It is vital to make it to this meeting to unite forces with Edelthrad and confront Kunrad.

traits.locale_text: Ein Servoschädel der Handelsbriefkammer hat Edelthrads Nachricht übermittelt: Der Erbe ist am Leben und sammelt für einen Sturm auf die Brücke loyale Anhänger der Dynastie um sich. Es ist unerlässlich, es zu diesem Treffen zu schaffen, sich mit Edelthrad zusammenzutun und Kunrad zu stellen.

languages.text: Un servocrâne de la salle de la lettre de marque a relayé ce message d'Edelthrad : l'héritier est en vie et rassemble les personnes restées loyales à la dynastie pour prendre la passerelle d'assaut. Il est vital de se rendre à ce rassemblement pour se joindre à Edelthrad et confronter Kunrad.
languages.original_text: A servo-skull from the Warrant Chamber has relayed Edelthrad's message: the heir is alive and gathering people loyal to the dynasty to storm the bridge. It is vital to make it to this meeting to unite forces with Edelthrad and confront Kunrad.

traits.locale_text: Un servocrâne de la salle de la lettre de marque a relayé ce message d'Edelthrad : l'héritier est en vie et rassemble les personnes restées loyales à la dynastie pour prendre la passerelle d'assaut. Il est vital de se rendre à ce rassemblement pour se joindre à Edelthrad et confronter Kunrad.

languages.text: 来自授状大厅的伺服头骨带来了重要的信息：继承人艾德萨德还活着，正在召集忠于王朝的战士，准备夺回舰桥。必须与艾德萨德见个面，与他齐心协力，对付昆拉德。
languages.original_text: A servo-skull from the Warrant Chamber has relayed Edelthrad's message: the heir is alive and gathering people loyal to the dynasty to storm the bridge. It is vital to make it to this meeting to unite forces with Edelthrad and confront Kunrad.

traits.locale_text: 来自许可证大厅的伺服头骨带来了重要的信息：继承人艾德萨德还活着，正在召集忠于王朝的战士，准备夺回舰桥。必须与艾德萨德见个面，与他齐心协力，对付昆拉德。

languages.text: 令状部屋のサーヴォスカルがエデルスラドのメッセージを伝えた。継承者は生きており、王朝に忠誠を誓う者たちを集めてブリッジを襲撃しようとしている。エデルスラドと力を合わせてクンラッドに立ち向かうためには、何としてでもこの会議に間に合わなければならない。
languages.original_text: A servo-skull from the Warrant Chamber has relayed Edelthrad's message: the heir is alive and gathering people loyal to the dynasty to storm the bridge. It is vital to make it to this meeting to unite forces with Edelthrad and confront Kunrad.

traits.locale_text: 令状部屋のサーヴォスカルがエデルスラドのメッセージを伝えた。継承者は生きており、王朝に忠誠を誓う者たちを集めてブリッジを襲撃しようとしている。エデルスラドと力を合わせてクンラッドに立ち向かうためには、何としてでもこの会議に間に合わなければならない。

languages.text: Un servocráneo de la sala de la Patente ha transmitido el mensaje de Edelthrad: el heredero está vivo y reuniendo a la gente fiel a la dinastía para asaltar el puente. Es esencial llegar a ese encuentro para unir fuerzas con Edelthrad y hacer frente a Kunrad.
languages.original_text: A servo-skull from the Warrant Chamber has relayed Edelthrad's message: the heir is alive and gathering people loyal to the dynasty to storm the bridge. It is vital to make it to this meeting to unite forces with Edelthrad and confront Kunrad.

traits.locale_text: Un servocráneo de la cámara de la Patente ha transmitido el mensaje de Edelthrad: el heredero está vivo y reuniendo a la gente fiel a la dinastía para asaltar el puente. Es esencial llegar a ese encuentro para unir fuerzas con Edelthrad y hacer frente a Kunrad.

languages.text: Ruhsatname Odası'ndan gelen hizmelet, Edelthrad'ın mesajını aktardı. Anlaşılan vâris hayatta ve köprüye beraber hücum etmek için, hanedanlığa sadık insanları yanına topluyor. Edelthrad'la birlik olup Kunrad'ın karşısına dikilmek için bu buluşma elzem.
languages.original_text: A servo-skull from the Warrant Chamber has relayed Edelthrad's message: the heir is alive and gathering people loyal to the dynasty to storm the bridge. It is vital to make it to this meeting to unite forces with Edelthrad and confront Kunrad.

traits.locale_text: Ruhsatname Odası'ndan gelen hizmelet, Edelthrad'ın mesajını aktardı. Anlaşılan vâris hayatta ve köprüye beraber hücum etmek için, hanedanlığa sadık insanları yanına topluyor. Edelthrad'la birlik olup Kunrad'ın karşısına dikilmek için bu buluşma elzem.
